TITLE: Pets
INCUBATING_TEXT:
Your **{{egg}}** is incubating.
Time remaining: **{{time}}**

Tip: when it's ready, use **{{prefix}}pet** again to hatch it.
NO_PETS_TEXT:
You don't have pets yet.

1) Buy an **egg** in `{{prefix}}shop`
2) Buy an **incubator**
3) Use: `{{prefix}}use incubadora` to incubate (consumes 1 egg)
4) Then use `{{prefix}}pet` to see progress / hatch.
